payload.description: Update user_management.py to support 'superadmin' role. Lines 841, 936, 1025 use email-based superadmin detection. Replace `requester_role == 'admin' and requester_email == Config.SUPERADMIN_EMAIL` with `requester_role == 'superadmin'` or `requester_role in ['admin', 'superadmin']` as appropriate. Line 841 checks `is_org_admin = org_role == 'admin'` which may need to include 'superadmin'.
payload.context: Adding proper superadmin role differentiation. Replace email-based superadmin detection with role-based checks.
